sections.heading: Privacy Policy
sections.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use the masterthepixel sample site.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect information you provide directly, such as contact form submissions, and automatically via cookies and analytics.

sections.heading: Use of Information
sections.content: We use the information to operate and improve our services, respond to inquiries, and for analytics.

sections.heading: Third-Party Services
sections.content: We may use third-party services (e.g., analytics, hosting) that process data on our behalf.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.content: If you have questions about this policy, contact: privacy@masterthepixel.io

cta.heading: Questions?
cta.content: Have questions about our privacy practices? Get in touch.
